Class FoldX

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core.FoldX

  • public class FoldX
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that prepare mutation files for FoldX and generate reports after introducing mutation to PDB structures
    Author:
    Ammar Ammar

      • getFoldxResults

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getFoldxResults(java.lang.String entriesPath)

        Returns:

      • buildFoldxReport

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> buildFoldxReport(java.lang.String entriesPath)
        A method to generate a report from FoldX reported energies with SD and stability index
        Parameters:
        entriesPath - of the FoldX processing folder
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays to be written to a TSV file
